content: With roots in California, this former child-actor had her breakthrough in TV before becoming a pop culture icon and fashion influencer. Her name is "Mary-Kate" who?

I think I know who you're talking about! Mary-Kate Olsen, right? She's a famous actress and fashion designer from the United States. She gained popularity along with her twin sister Ashley Olsen as child actors in the TV show "Full House." They were known as Michelle and Stephanie Tanner on the show. After "Full House," they went on to have successful careers in fashion, creating their own clothing lines. Mary-Kate is definitely a pop culture icon and a fashion influencer. Is that the person you were thinking of?
